channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wow That's Amazing
channel.desc: Get ready for incredible experiments and mind-bending puzzles to impress your friends with Wow That?s Amazing. Owain and Tilly are here to explore epic science tricks to try at home and showcase brand new technology innovations from around the world! In this episode, discover a weird way to puzzle your pupils, reveal the fizzy secrets of sand, find out that static electricity can be attractive and learn to bust some earthquake dance moves.
